forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
The day in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a gentle embrace of sunlight, as the sun casts its warm hues across the city’s familiar skyline. Present conditions reveal a mostly clear expanse, albeit with whispers of clouds brushing delicately against the horizon. While the high might linger near 60, a subtle drop in temperature beckons in the afternoon, nudging it toward a cool 58. The west-northwest winds provide a refreshing touch, making it all the more pleasant to stroll along the waterfront or relax on a park bench with a warm cup of coffee.

As the evening draws near, the sky will don a partly cloudy cloak, with temperatures dipping to around 50. It is wise to bring along a light jacket to fend off the chill, especially as the enticing golden light fades. Today’s conditions offer a perfect canvas for a leisurely walk through one of the city’s inviting neighborhoods or a visit to a cozy café, where the aroma of freshly baked goods offers a welcome invitation. As the day seamlessly transitions to dusk, finding a spot with a view of the Bay might just reward you with a breathtaking sunset, the kind that stitches a moment in time with vivid memories.
